attributes.action: scrap the proposals to close St Luke's CofE (VC) First School, Cleckheaton, as set out in the "Schools for the Future" plans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kirklees Council, as part of their proposals for the re-organisation of schools in this area, seek to close St Luke's CofE First School.

Please help us to fight the closure of St Luke's school.

A small school in the heart of a community, with excellent links to the Church.

A school which children, parents, governors and staff are proud to be part of.  A school that cares, guides and enhances the lives of its pupils.   

Our children achieve a high level of education, they do this in a place where everyone is valued.  All the staff know all the children and their families.  All the staff know all the childrens abilities, qualities and strengths.  This is a school that provides a good all-round education, establishing confidence and high self-esteem, teaching it's pupils how to respect themselves and others.  

St Luke's is a school that other schools could emmulate. 

This is a thriving popular school  that serves its community and provides a strong start to our childrens school life.

Our school should not be a closed school.

There is no good reason why this school should be closed. 

Please sign our petition and encourage others to do so.

Thankyou.

government_responses.details:
